brand_identity.name: Stepik Analytics
brand_identity.mission: Empower educators with crystal-clear insights into student performance.

layout_strategy.bento_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 lg:grid-cols-6 gap-6 auto-rows-[minmax(180px,auto)]

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary-hover shadow-sm rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: bg-transparent text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-colors

cards.default: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl shadow-sm p-6 hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200
cards.kpi: flex flex-col justify-between h-full bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl p-6 shadow-sm relative overflow-hidden

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-white file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-500 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-primary focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

avalonia_dotnet.styling: Use App.axaml for global styles. Define ColorPalette in <Application.Resources>.
avalonia_dotnet.charts: LiveCharts2 (Use CartesianChart for timelines, PieChart for distribution).

universal_guidelines: Always use the 'Manrope' font for headings to give a modern, technical feel.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A) for maximum contrast text.
KPI Cards must show a 'Trend' indicator (green up arrow, red down arrow) for metrics like DAU or Submissions.
Charts should be clean: remove grid lines if possible, or make them very subtle (slate-100).
Use 'Stepik Green' (#10B981) for primary actions and positive trends.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state (slightly darker bg or lifted shadow).
Padding is luxury. Don't cram content. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards.
